support.title: Support Services
support.subtext: A complete range of support services across producing and buying countries
support.content:
We have a network of Country Representatives offering production support services in the main producing countries and customer-facing support in the principal Buying markets:

**Producing Countries**                                                                 

**Mauritius, Madagascar, South Africa, Swaziland, Lesotho, Botswana, Tanzania, Ethiopia, Egypt, Morocco, Kenya, Uganda**
Coming Soon: Tunisia                                                                             

**Buying Markets**

**USA, Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Baltic Countries, Poland, Ukraine, Russia, South Africa, Reunion**
Coming Soon: France, Portugal
